game.name: Misty Valley: A Cozy Fishing Tale
game.shortDescription: Welcome to Misty Valley, cast your line, sail to hidden islands, and uncover secrets of the sea. Befriend charming villagers, tend your farm, and explore a world full of wonder, mystery, and gentle adventure. Your story begins where the mist meets the tide.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to Misty Valley, cast your line, sail to hidden islands, and uncover secrets of the sea. Befriend charming villagers, tend your farm, and explore a world full of wonder, mystery, and gentle adventure. Your story begins where the mist meets the tide.
